title: 820-2936 missing U5400
message:
820-2936 missing U5400
And missing all pads to solder a new U5400
Can this board works without U5400? What is its role?

title: 820-2936 missing U5400
message:
Connect pin 1 of R5403 to pin 1 of R5413. This is cheating but I think it should pass ASD like that. U5400 is the current sensor for the CPU rails. 
Not sure if this will work but run ASD after you did this.

title: 820-2936 missing U5400
message:
Problem is this board has no video now. Not lvds and not external monitor. USB mouse is active (light). So I dont know where to start.

What I checked is in LVDS connector I have PP3V3_LCDVDD_SW_F at 3.3V

title: 820-2936 missing U5400
message:
If PP3V3_LCDVDD_SW_F is high there must be an image, check again. Use a flashlight to check.

What is voltage on PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT?

title: 820-2936 missing U5400
message:
You are right. It works with another screen. With his screen no video... meybe lcd cable
With another screen it has video but no backlight. I did a reflow to LP8550 and now backlight is ok. Should I replace it or this is ok

title: 820-2936 missing U5400
message: Up to you, but I would replace to be sure.

title: 820-2936 missing U5400
message: Ok, now I need to replace the screen. It is true all screen A1278 from 2008 to 2012 are the same?
